definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Jos 10:10, Jos 10:11, also [[חׂרוֹן]] ´[[בּ]], [[חׂרׂן]] ´[[בּ]], & in Ch [[חוֹרוֹן]] ´[[בּ]], two cities in Ephraim, lower & upper B.H. (place of a hole or hollow (?) [[חׂר]], perh. fr. a wady betw. the two, or near by; cf. also [[מַעֲלֶה]] Jos 10:10, [[מוֹרַד]] v:Jos 10:11 1Ma 3:16, 1Ma 3:24) 1Ch 7:24 [[אֶת־בּית־חוֹרוֹן הַתַּחְתּוֹן וְאֶת־הָעֶלְיוֹן]]; further,

definitions.title: adj.gent.
definitions.body: Ne 2:10, Ne 2:19, Ne 13:28, only of Sanballat; also du. [[חׂרׂנַיִם]] Jos 10:10, Jos 10:11 LXX & 2Sa 13:34 LXX We Dr.
